scripts.ocelot: set -a; . ./.env.ocelot; set +a; for FILE in ./Config/Ocelot/Production/*.json; do echo $FILE; cat $FILE | jq 'walk(if type == "string" and ((startswith("$"))) then env[.[1:]] else . end)' > ./Config/Ocelot/Build/$(basename "$FILE"); done;
scripts.ocelot:staging: set -a; . ./.env.ocelot; . ./.env.staging.ocelot; set +a; for FILE in ./Config/Ocelot/Production/*.json; do echo $FILE; cat $FILE | jq 'walk(if type == "string" and ((startswith("$"))) then env[.[1:]] else . end)' > ./Config/Ocelot/Build/$(basename "$FILE"); done;
scripts.ocelot:dev: set -a; . ./.env.ocelot; . ./.env.dev.ocelot;  for FILE in ./Config/Ocelot/Production/*.json; do echo $FILE; cat $FILE | jq 'walk(if type == "string" and ((startswith("$"))) then env[.[1:]] else . end)' > ./Config/Ocelot/Development/$(basename "$FILE"); done;
